about_app_intro_title: Your primery destination for smart shopping and real savings.
about_app_intro_body:
At Wffrasah, we believe that fun shopping shouldn't be expensive. We are an integrated platform that brings you the latest and strongest coupons and discount offers from the most famous local and international stores in one place.

.
why_us_intro: Because we ensure you get a discount code that works from the first time, Wffrasah is here to offer you a reliable discount experience via:
feature_daily_update_desc: We manually check and test all coupons daily to ensure their effectiveness and validity.
feature_exclusive_offers_desc: Special discount codes for Wffrasah users only through direct partnerships with stores.
feature_smart_alerts_desc: Never miss a chance! We will send you instant notifications when a new offer is available for your favorite store.
feature_transparency_desc: Clarifying all coupon usage conditions clearly before use.
follow_us_text: Follow us and share your experience or inquiries via our official platforms:
faq_a1: Yes, the app is completely free. We receive a small commission from stores when you use coupons through our app, and this does not affect the price you pay.
faq_q2: How do I use a discount code?
faq_a2: Simply click on the "Copy Code" button, then paste it into the coupon field on the payment page in the store.
faq_q3: The code doesn't work, what should I do?
faq_a3: Make sure to read the coupon usage conditions (such as minimum order and included products). If the problem persists, it means the code validity has expired.
faq_q4: Can I use the discount code more than once?
faq_a4: Yes. This varies from one store to another, but in many cases, the discount code can be used multiple times.
faq_q5: Are discount codes updated in the app?
faq_a5: Yes. Discount codes are constantly updated to ensure providing the latest and best offers for users.
privacy_top_note: Privacy Policy - wffrasah سياسة الخصوصية . موقع وتطبيق وفرها صح This Privacy Policy explains how wffrasah collects, uses. and protects your personal information when you use our website and services
privacy_intro:
This Privacy Policy explains how wffrasah collects, uses, and protects your personal information when you use our website and services.

We respect the privacy and confidentiality of the personal data of our customers and visitors. While we strive to provide an improved shopping experience, we realize that one of the most important concerns is the safety of personal information, so we are committed to ensuring that all personal data provided to us remains secure and is not used except for the purposes agreed upon by the customer.

Initially, we only collect the necessary personal information to provide the services you requested, understand your needs, and serve you better. We also provide our merchant partners only with the information necessary to verify and track your rewards.

We do not sell your information under any circumstances.
privacy_point1_body:
This document aims to clarify how Wffrasah manages, collects, uses, and discloses personal data belonging to you and users of our website, applications, software, and other platforms.

We conduct our business in accordance with applicable data protection laws, and we have implemented additional measures to protect your personal information. Your continued use of our services constitutes your consent to abide by this privacy policy as updated from time to time.
privacy_point2_body: The term "personal data" means any data relating to a person who can be identified from it, whether directly or indirectly, including data in our records.
privacy_point3_body:
The data that Wffrasah may collect depends on the products, services, and offers you use or subscribe to. This data is collected to enable the platforms to work properly and to know how they are used on different devices and browsers.

Usually, we collect your data when you do the following:

Providing us with contact information after visiting, using, or installing our websites or applications.
Registering for our services or filling out any forms.
Subscribing to alerts or newsletters.
Contacting us for inquiries or requesting help.
Participating in competitions or surveys.
Submitting a CV or job applications.
Referral to us from partners or third parties.
privacy_point4_body:
Identity: Full name, email, date of birth, phone number, photos, IP address, device ID, and payment information.
Interactions with us: Call recordings, email, and correspondence.
Account: Your Wffrasah account information.
Use of services: Browsing data and cookies.
Preferences: Favorite products brands, and communication methods.
privacy_point5_body:
We implement strict measures to protect your data, including:

Using 128-bit encrypted SSL connection.
Storing data on secure servers.
Restricting access to information.
Applying strict verification mechanisms.
Destroying data when not needed.
privacy_point6_body:
We do not sell or trade your personal data. We use it to:

1) To manage services
To fulfill orders, track transactions, add cashback, and provide offers and rewards.

2) To improve services
Analyze complaints, improve performance, customize content, and send relevant ads.

3) Customer Service
Responding to inquiries and providing support.

4) Security and Compliance
Fraud prevention and compliance with regulations and laws.

5) Job Applications
Processing job applications and managing employment records.

We retain data only for the period necessary legally or operationally.
privacy_point7_body:
We may share your data with:

Our partners and service providers.
Investors or parties involved in acquisition or merger deals.
Government or regulatory authorities upon request.
privacy_point8_body: We may send you promotional messages, and you can unsubscribe at any time.
privacy_point9_body: Wffrasah may cooperate with third parties to display personalized ads based on your activity on the Internet. This policy does not cover the practices of those parties.
privacy_point10_body:
You can update your data through your account, or contact us via:
contact@Wffrasah.com
privacy_point11_title: Your Rights to Access and Withdraw Consent
privacy_point11_body:
You can request access to your data or withdraw your consent at any time via the email above.
Withdrawal of consent may result in our inability to provide certain services.
privacy_point12_body:
To request deletion of your account and data, contact us from your registered email.

Please note:

You will lose any remaining cashback.
All your personal data will be deleted.
We will keep transaction records for auditing purposes.
You will not be able to log in again.
privacy_point13_body: Wffrasah reserves the right to modify the policy at any time, and updates will be posted on the site.
privacy_point14_body: This policy is subject to the laws of the country in which you reside.
terms_intro: By using the (Wffrasah) application, you agree to abide by the following terms of use. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use the application.
terms_point1_body: The application provides a platform for displaying coupons and promotional offers provided by third parties, and does not guarantee the availability or validity of all offers at all times.
terms_point2_body:
• You must be at least 13 years old (or according to applicable local laws).
• You are responsible for the correctness and accuracy of the information you provide when using the application.
terms_point3_body:
• All coupons and offers are subject to the terms and conditions of the provider.
• The application assumes no responsibility for cancellation, modification, or expiration of any offer.
• It is prohibited to use coupons in illegal ways or contrary to regulations.
terms_point4_body: All content within the application, including texts, designs, and logos, is owned by the application or its licensors, and copying or reusing it without prior permission is prohibited.
terms_point5_body: The application administration has the right to suspend or terminate the user's account in case of violation of the terms of use or misuse of the application, without prior notice.
terms_point6_body: The application is provided "as is" without any express or implied warranties. We assume no responsibility for any direct or indirect losses resulting from the use of offers or coupons.
terms_point7_body: We reserve the right to amend the terms of use at any time, and your continued use of the application after the amendments constitutes your agreement to them.
terms_point8_body: These terms are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the country from which the application is operated, and jurisdiction shall be for its courts.
terms_point9_body: For any inquiries regarding the Terms of Use, please contact us via the support channels available within the application.
